synopsis.text:
Remo—with no recollection of her purpose—joins Dual and Dorothy, dedicated antivirus programs, in the Box of Wisdom, a gravity-free space teeming with vibrant lights, countless worlds, and innumerable timelines. Tasked with eradicating viruses that threaten these realms, Dual and Dorothy often face the grim necessity of purging entire infected worlds.

Their unwavering routine is disrupted when they rescue Remo from a virus attack. With her mysterious origins and enigmatic desire to return to the "flower garden," Remo introduces an unexpected twist to their monotonous existence. Intrigued, Dual and Dorothy embark on a quest to unravel her forgotten purpose.

As they traverse the digitally recreated cities and landscapes, the trio begins to appreciate the beauty of their surroundings, realizing there's more to their lives than just their mission. With Remo's influence, Dual and Dorothy learn to experience the worlds they've been safeguarding, all while uncovering the secrets of Remo's past and her connection to the flower garden.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
